pageContext.claim: “Mexico talks, but they do nothing for us, especially at the border.  Certainly don’t help us much on trade, but especially at the border, they do nothing for us.”
pageContext.analysis: Mexico actually cooperates very closely with the United States on border security. Only a few weeks before Trump made this comment, Homeland Security Secretary Kirstjen Nielsen and Mexican Foreign Minister Luis Videgaray signed an agreement to promote joint cooperation to stop illegal merchandise crossing the border. Nielsen said the two countries were also working on about 20 further memorandums of understanding and letters of intent.
